articles.title: Kim Jong Un Tours Farm Machine Exhibition
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Tours Farm Machine Exhibition
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited a farm machine exhibition.
					 Looking at various farm machines and their spare parts and small farm implements on display, he learned in detail about their performance and specifications.
					
					 He praised the Cabinet, the Ministry of Agriculture and other relevant sectors for striving to manufacture modern farm machines with indigenous efforts and technology as intended by the Party.
					
					 It was a lifetime desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to free the agricultural workers from difficult and toilsome work by comprehensively mechanizing the agriculture, he said, calling upon all the officials, Party members and other working people of the relevant sectors to turn out in a drive for translating the desire into a reality.
					
					 It is important to put the production of farm machines on a Juche basis, he said, underscoring the need to devise and manufacture utility farm machines suited to the natural and geographical features of the country and its local conditions and constitution of Koreans by domestic efforts and technology.
					
					 It is necessary to give precedence to designing in order to produce modern farm machines, he said, adding that efforts should be channeled into designing auto, semi-auto and manual farm machines and advanced technology be actively introduced in view of the world trend in production of farm machines.
					
					 He also stressed the importance to take thorough measures for supplying materials and tools needed for farm machine production, build up the ranks of technicians and skilled workers and properly conduct the work for raising their technical level.
					
					 As there are full-fledged farm machine production bases provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and workers of the country are experienced in producing various kinds of farm machines and their spare parts, it is quite possible to turn out modern farm machines if they set to work with a vengeance, he said.
					
					 Noting that he would actively back the production of farm machines by personally solving the problems arising in it, he encouraged the officials of the Cabinet and the Ministry of Agriculture to work out in a big way and boldly push ahead with the drive for increasing the proportion of the mechanization of agriculture.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and working people of the Cabinet, the Ministry of Agriculture and other relevant sectors would remain true to the intention of the Party to make a breakthrough for new victory on the agricultural front.
					
					 Accompanying him were Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Ri Chol Man and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cote d'Ivoire
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Alassane Ouattara, president of Cote d'Ivoire, on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields and sincerely wished the president and people of Cote d'Ivoire greater successes in their work for the socio-economic development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Foreign Campers Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Campers Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign campers groups who participated in the 30th Songdowon International Children's Camping visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Thursday.
					 They looked round the historic relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae, where the President spent his childhood, nurturing a great intention to make revolution. 
					
					 They had a picture taken before the old home and went round revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also visited the Munsu Water Park, the Rungna Dolphinarium, the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace and other places.

articles.title: National Seminar Held
articles.content:
National Seminar Held
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A national seminar was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday for the purpose of deeply studying and grasping and adding shine to the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung who led the anti-Japanese war to victory and the glorious revolutionary tradition of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Vice Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials of the party, administrative and working people's organizations, armed forces organs, officials in fields of science, education, literature and arts, media, institutions for training party officials and the preservation of revolutionary relics. 
					
					Ri Yong Sik, editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, Ju Song Chil, vice- president of Kim Il Sung Military University, and others presented papers proving the immortal feats the President performed by leading the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory with his Juche-oriented revolutionary idea and line, outstanding strategy and tactics and war methods and thereby accomplishing the historic cause of Korea's liberation and laying an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					The speakers deeply proved that the victory in the anti-Japanese revolutionary war which gave an origin to the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche was the shining one of the immortal Juche idea and Songun idea founded by the President.
					
					Recalling that the President declared the anti-Japanese war as a people's war according to his original theory of armed struggle that the people mean a state and rear and regular armed forces, they emphasized that he defined the political and ideological advantages of the people, a driving force  for waging a war, and service personnel as the essential advantages of the revolutionary army and propounded the Juche-oriented military idea centered on man calling for defeating the enemy's numerical and technical superiority with political and ideological advantages.
					
					All operations and battles during the anti-Japanese revolutionary war irrefutably proved the truth and validity of the original military idea of the President who solved all issues by motivating the thinking of the service personnel, they noted, and continued:
					
					The President was a peerless statesman who created the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, with his original method of ideological campaign and thus provided the best mental pabulum for building a rich and powerful country.
					
					The speakers called upon all officials, party members and other people to eternally glorify the feats performed by the peerlessly great men in achieving Korea's liberation and building the above-said country and give full play to the great mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and thus win the final victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Closes
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Closes
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of inventions and new technologies closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Thursday. It was opened on the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and Korea's liberation.
					 Remote system for supporting operation, wind-powered water pump, general analyzer for fishpond water and other research achievements on display at the exhibition were appreciated by the participants for their good idea, big economic profits and practical significance.
					
					 The exhibition also involved a work for widely introducing more than 250 scientific and technological achievements conducive to the building of an economic power, exchange of intellectual products, scientific and technological public presentation and lecture. 
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned, scientists, technicians and inventors.
					
					 15 units placed first. They included the State Academy of Sciences, Academy of Agricultural Science, Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, Publication Guidance Bureau, Pyongyang City Science and Technology Committee and the Chollima Tile Factory.
					
					 The first prize went to more than 100 presenters including Pak Kyong Hwa, researcher of the Marine Transportation Science Institute, Yun Song Chol, chief engineer of the Sangwon Cement Complex, and Han Hoe Bok, workshop manager of the Changgong Trade Company.  
					
					 A closing address was made by Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission.

articles.title: Method of Extracting Natural Pigments Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Method of Extracting Natural Pigments Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The Tongmyong Joint Venture Company in the DPRK succeeded in extracting natural pigments from seaweeds.
					 Green and pink pigments extracted from seaweeds are considered to have strong pharmacological effects and be efficacious against cancer, while being widely accepted in producing toothpaste and cosmetics worldwide.
					
					 The success in extracting those pigments from seaweeds is expected to bring about a big change in pharmaceutical and foodstuff industries.
					
					 It was registered as a patent of the DPRK.

articles.title: Many Intellectual Products Getting Popular
articles.content:
Many Intellectual Products Getting Popular
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Many intellectual products were presented to the national exhibition of inventions and new technologies held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House here.
					 According to Kim Hyok, a section chief of the DPRK Invention Office, the exhibits included electronics and information products, measuring and analyzing apparatuses and medicines.
					
					 Among those exhibits winning high appraisal were intellectual products developed by the State Academy of Sciences, Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport and the Samhung IT Exchange Company.
					
					 Various black pearl belts presented by the Chongryu IT Exchange Company won a great popularity among the visitors for their medical effects.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Will Be Forsaken by People for Railroading War Bills: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Will Be Forsaken by People for Railroading War Bills: Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Many Japanese people from all walks of life are holding rallies and demos in Tokyo and other places with placards "Prevent War!" in their hands in protest against the railroading of security bills through the session of the House of Representatives.
					Recently more than 150 Japanese scholars held a press conference protesting the passage of the bills at which they made pubic a statement saying that the present chief executive's railroading of the bills is an act of ignoring the people's mindset. The Japanese authorities' adoption of the bills is criticized by the Japanese political circle and the international community.
					
					Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says if Japan is opposed to war, it needs no new law. The news analyst goes on:
					
					Japan unleashed a war of aggression against countries in the Asia-Pacific in the past. Unspeakable are the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists during their invasion of Asian countries in the past period.
					
					The Japanese government has not yet even admitted the past crimes. Worse still, it is embellishing the war crimes.
					
					Turning Japan into a military giant and launching overseas expansion are the invariable ambition of the Japanese militarists.
					
					Japan's passage of the security bills is a revelation of its criminal design to realize its overseas aggression by zealously joining the U.S in its strategy for world domination.
					
					Such moves will make the Japanese reactionaries forsaken by the people.

articles.title: South Korean Fighters' Participation in Joint Air Drills under Fire
articles.content:
South Korean Fighters' Participation in Joint Air Drills under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Six  F-16Ds of the south Korean puppet air force  on Aug. 4 flew to Alaska to take part in the joint military drills "Red Flag" sponsored by the command of the U.S. Pacific Air Force, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 It was reported that those fighters were to conduct an air combat drill and ground attack exercise as part of advance rehearsals for getting familiar with the local conditions.
					
					 The joint drills to take place from Aug. 10 to 21 would involve air interception, air cover and other forms of offensive drills in which guided precision missiles and conventional bombs would be used.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers' reckless saber-rattling clearly shows what is behind their much-touted "dialogue."

articles.title: South Korean Peasants Assail "Saenuri Party"
articles.content:
South Korean Peasants Assail "Saenuri Party"
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Peasants of the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea staged a protest action against the ruling "Saenuri Party's" hypocritical action before its building on July 31, according to the south Korean online paper Newsis.
					 They recalled that the "Saenuri Party" pledged to "protect south Korean rice" before its people last year and displayed literature widely advertising it throughout south Korea.
					
					 The party, however, didn't say anything about the Ministry of Agriculture and Food's recent announcement of its decision to import American rice, they deplored.
					
					 The peasants denounced the ruling party for leaving no means untried to meet its political objective, staging a ceremony symbolic of protest against the ruling party's hypocrisy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced in Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang August 6 (KCNA) -- The summary of the congratulatory speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 4th National Conference of War Veterans was carried by the Ethiopian paper Daily Monitor on July 30.
					 The congratulatory speech, made on July 25, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that July 27 of Korea is the second Day of Liberation when the Korean people defended with honor their country's dignity and sovereignty from the brigandish aggression by the U.S. imperialists, and also the day of proud victors that put the U.S. imperialists on a downhill march towards ruin.
					
					 It also says: The war veterans have devoted all their life to the independent reunification and prosperity of their country. Their noble fighting spirit and splendid patriotic feats will shine brilliantly in inerasable golden letters in the history of the heroic struggle of our people.

articles.title: History of DPRK's War Victory Will Be Given Steady Continuity: Foreign Papers
articles.content:
History of DPRK's War Victory Will Be Given Steady Continuity: Foreign Papers
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups to mark the 62nd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Russian paper Nizhegorodskaya Pravda on July 23 devoted one whole page to articles under the bannerline "Fatherland Liberation War" illustrated with a photo dealing with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The U.S. ignited a war of aggression with its ambition for dominating the whole of Korea after occupying south Korea right after the liberation of Korea but bent its knees before the army and people of the DPRK who turned out in the war under the leadership of the President, the paper said, adding the history of the DPRK's victory in the war will be given steady continuity.
					
					 The 28th issue of the Russian paper Veteran carried similar articles.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath on July 27 carried an article titled "July 27 in the DPRK, day of victory" illustrated with a photo showing the tremendous might of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Thawrah on the same day said that under the outstanding leadership of the President the KPA prevailed over the enemy with numerical and technological advantages by dint of political and ideological, strategic and tactical advantages.
					
					 The Kuwaiti paper Al-Anba and the Senegalese paper Le Populaire on July 27 carried articles praising the President for leading the Fatherland Liberation war to victory.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to celebrate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation on July 28 and 31.
					 They included a meeting in Russia, lecture and photo exhibition in Mongolia and film show in Nigeria.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos on revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice-director of the International Department of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia said the President liberated the country from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists by leading the 15 year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to a victory, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il rallied all the service personnel and people around the leader, smashed the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK by pursuing the unique Songun politics and thus defended socialism.
					
					 The idea and cause of the President and Kim Jong Il have been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Mongolia-Democratic Korea Friendship Bridge Association said the exploits the President performed by liberating Korea, a turning point for the Korean people to independently carve out their destiny and achieve prosperity, will shine for all ages.
					
					 The director of a Nigerian company, after watching the Korean films "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "The Arch of Triumph", said the exploits the President performed by liberating the country will shine long in the world history of struggle for national liberation against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de exhibicion de maquinas agricolas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de exhibicion de maquinas agricolas
						
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, hizo recorrido por el lugar de exhibicion de maquinas agricolas.
					El Mariscal estudio en detalles la capacidad y las caracteristicas tecnicas de las maquinas, las piezas y aperos agricolas exhibidos.
					
					Se puede saber que el Consejo de Ministros, el Ministerio de Agricultura y las ramas correspondientes se esfuerzan activamente por fabricar por sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas las modernas maquinas agricolas en acato al proposito del Partido, evaluo.
					
					Los grandes Lideres tuvieron en su existencia el deseo de liberar a los trabajadores agricolas de los trabajos duros mediante la mecanizacion universal de la agricultura, dijo y continuo que los funcionarios, los miembros del Partido y los trabajadores de los dominios correspondientes deben levantarse como un solo hombre a la lucha por practicarlo.
					
					Diciendo que es importante la produccion nacional de las maquinas agricolas, agrego que hay que inventar y fabricar con la fuerza y tecnica nacionales las maquinas agricolas que pueden usar en varios objetos y es conveniente a las caracteristicas geofisicas y locales y a la constitucion fisica de los coreanos. 
					
					A fin de producir las modernas maquinas agricolas se necesita anteponer el diseno, senalo y menciono que hay que dedicar muchos esfuerzos al diseno de las maquinas agricolas automaticas, semiautomaticas y manuales e introducir activamente las tecnicas avanzadas siendo sensible a la corriente mundial de produccion de maquinas agricolas.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de tomar estrictamente las medidas para suministrar los materiales y herramientas necesarios a la produccion de maquinas agricolas, formar bien a los tecnicos y obreros calificados y organizar bien el trabajo para elevar el nivel de tecnica y habilidad de ellos.
					
					El Mariscal apunto que si toman la decision firme tenemos la capacidad segura de producir las maquinas modernas agricolas, ya que estan preparadas suficientemente las bases de produccion preparadas por los grandes lideres y las experiencias de los obreros en la produccion de varias maquinas y accesorios agricolas.
					
					Diciendo que el mismo resolvera personalmente los problemas relativos a la produccion de maquinas agricolas y ayudara activamente, el Mariscal inspiro animo y valor a los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros y el Ministerio de Agricultura a operar y acelerar con gran audacia el trabajo para elevar mas la proporcion de la mecanizacion del campo.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y trabajadores de dominios correspondientes como el Consejo de Ministros y el Ministro de Agricultura apoyaran con fidelidad el proposito del Partido para abrir nueva brecha de la victoria en el frente agricola.
					
					Le acompanaron Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Ri Chol Man y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 55o aniversario de independencia de Cote d´Ivoire
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 55o aniversario de independencia de Cote d´Ivoire
						
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Cote d´Ivoire, Alassane Ouattara, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se amplien y se desarrollen mas en varias esferas, el remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en las labores para el desarrollo social-economico y prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Tiene lugar seminario nacional sobre hazanas de Kim Il Sung y tradiciones de PTC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar seminario nacional sobre hazanas de Kim Il Sung y tradiciones de PTC
						
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario nacional para estudiar y glorificar las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung por la victoria en la lucha antijaponesa y las gloriosas tradiciones revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Asistieron alli el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y de administracion, entidades de masas, organos de las fuerzas armadas, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, planteles docentes de funcionarios partidistas y de la rama de historia revolucionaria. 
					
					El editor-jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, Ri Yong Sik, el vicerrector de la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, Ju Song Chil, y otros funcionarios presentaron las disertaciones para argumentar las imborrables proezas del Presidente quien al conducir a la victoria la lucha armada antijaponesa con la idea revolucionaria y lineas autoctonas y las estrategias, tacticas y metodos de combate destacados, cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria y preparo la eterna base de prosperidad de la patria y nacion. 
					
					Los oradores explicaron que la victoria en la guerra revolucionaria antijaponesa, que dio origen a la causa revolucionaria del Songun de tipo jucheano, es el relevante triunfo de la inmortal idea Juche y la del Songun, concebidas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Al proclamar la lucha antijaponesa como la guerra popular segun la doctrina oriental de que el pueblo es precisamente el Estado, la retaguardia y el ejercito regular, el Presidente determino la superioridad ideo-politica de los habitantes y los militares como la superioridad esencial del ejercito revolucionario y presento la autoctona idea militar humano-centrico de vencer con la preponderancia ideo-espiritual la superioridad numerica y tecnica de los enemigos, ratificaron
					
					Y agregaron que todas las operaciones y combates de la guerra revolucionaria antijaponesa manifestaron plenamente la veracidad y la vitalidad de la original idea militar del Presidente quien soluciono todos los problemas movilizando la fuerza espiritual de las masas militares. 
					
					Destacaron que el Presidente es el politico sin par quien al crear el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el de viento cortante del Paektu, preparo la mejor riqueza espiritual de la construccion de la patria prospera. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores a glorificar generacion tras generacion las proezas de los grandes hombres sin iguales acumuladas en la liberacion de la patria y la construccion de la patria prospera y poner de pleno manifiesto la gran fuerza espiritual de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y Corea de Kim Jong Il, siguiendo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, para lograr sin falta la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Clausurada exposicion nacional de invenciones y nuevas tecnicas
articles.content:
Clausurada exposicion nacional de invenciones y nuevas tecnicas
						
Pyongyang, 6 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada la Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnicas dedicada al 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y de la liberacion de la patria.
					Atrajeron la atencion de los participantes el sistema de apoyo de quirurgica de larga distancia, la bomba de agua de energia eolica, el analizador de calidad de agua para la piscicultura, la quitanieves en corriente, los materiales desinfectantes y detergentes y otros exitos de gran utilidad economica y eficiencia.
					
					En el marco del certamen se activaron las labores para aplicar ampliamente mas de 250 exitos cientificos y tecnicos en la construccion de la potencia economica, tuvieron lugar la circulacion de productos intelectuales, la presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas y se impartieron las lecciones. 
					
					La ceremonia de clausura tuvo lugar el dia 6 en la Exposicion Permanente de Tres Revoluciones con la participacion del secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el viceprimer Kim Yong Jin, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol, los funcionarios interesados, los cientificos, tecnicos e inventores.
					
					En la ceremonia se presento la decision de jurado. 
					
					15 unidades, inclusive la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas, el Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo, la Direccion de Prensa, el Comite de Ciencias y Tecnicas en la ciudad de Pyongyang y la Fabrica de Azulejos Chollita se adjudicaron primeros.
					
					Tambien obtuvieron primeros lugares mas de cien personas como la investigadora del Instituto de Ciencias Maritimas, Pak Kyong Hwa, el ingeniero jefe del Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon, Yun Song Chol, el jefe de oficina de la Empresa de Elaboracion de Productos Sofisticados de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, Jong Kum Song y el jefe de taller de la Compania Comercial Changgong, Han Hoe Bok.
					
					La palabra de clausura estuvo a cargo del presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas, Choe Sang Gon.
